Class SmartBuffer

java.lang.Object

public class SmartBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

A buffer for streams that uses an in-memory array, or a file depending on a maximum size that you can set. release() I'll say it again: finally { buffer.release(); } Keep repeating it to yourself till it sticks.
